alert.note: Alert for Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:21PM CDT until May 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 320 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Cherokee, or 8 miles southeast of J P Coleman State Park, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Iuka, Tishomingo State Park, Burnsville, Tishomingo, Midway, Paden, Bacon Springs, Oldham, Blythe Crossing, Carter Branch, Hazard Switch, Mingo, Holcut, Holts Spur, Petertown and Walker Siding. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
